author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter KERDI-DRAIN grate kit tips…I adjust the height and add mortar to the corners before installation. Mortar mechanically bonds the grate to the drain. I ensure the drain is equidistant from the walls so the tile work looks symmetrical. Remember, if you need help designing and tiling a shower, join our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tile #tileshower #schluter #brandpartner
title: Schluter Drain Grate Kit Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
